description.fr: Vaincre tous les Bworks. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} {PropertyEffect:45[ENRAGE]} un Bwork. \--- {%FightTurnStartedMonsters} Si tous les Bworks sont {PropertyEffect:45[ENRAGÉS]}, ils infligent {physicalDamage:d} autour\_ d'eux et perdent leur\_{PropertyEffect:45}.
description.en: Defeat all the Bworks. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} {PropertyEffect:45[ENRAGES]} a Bwork. \--- {%FightTurnStartedMonsters} If all the Bworks are {PropertyEffect:45[ENRAGED]}, they do {physicalDamage:d} around\_ them and lose their\_{PropertyEffect:45}.
description.es: Vencer a todos los bworks. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} {PropertyEffect:45[ENRABIA]} a un bwork. \--- {%FightTurnStartedMonsters} Si todos los bworks están {PropertyEffect:45[RABIOSOS]}, infligen {physicalDamage:d} a su alrededor\_ y pierden su\_{PropertyEffect:45}.
description.de: Besiege alle Bworks. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Versetzt einen Bwork in {PropertyEffect:45[RAGE]}. \--- {%FightTurnStartedMonsters} Falls alle Bworks in {PropertyEffect:45[RAGE]} sind, verursachen sie {physicalDamage:d} um sich herum\_ und ihre\_{PropertyEffect:45} wird aufgehoben.
description.pt: Derrotar todos os Bworks. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} {PropertyEffect:45[ENRAIVECE]} um Bwork. \--- {%FightTurnStartedMonsters} Se todos os Bworks estiverem {PropertyEffect:45[RAIVOSOS]}, eles infligem {physicalDamage:d} em\_volta\_ deles e perdem o\_{PropertyEffect:45}.
